div1.p: To the post Adjutant, Adjutant General.

I have the honor to report the death of the above-named soldier (D P Billions)Officer
and to request that the necessary steps be taken for his interment.

MAJOR & SURGEON, U. S. ARMY
COMMANDING HOSPITAL
Surgeon, U. S. Army.

Station, U. S. A. GENERAL HOSPITAL,
[unclear]

This copy of Record is to be transmitted to the Adjutant General of the Army immediately after the place of burial and the number
of the grave have been ascertained and registered. The above notification is to remain attached.
